name: Sculpture through the Ages
description: From ancient stone carvings to modern metal installations, navigate the fascinating journey of sculpture.

flashcards.question: Which ancient civilization created the colossal statues known as the Colossi of Memnon?
The 'Venus of Willendorf', a famous prehistoric sculpture, was found in which country?
Which Greek sculptor is credited with creating the statue of Zeus at Olympia, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World?
Which French sculptor created 'The Thinker' and 'The Gates of Hell'?
The 'Terracotta Army' was buried with the first emperor of which dynasty?
Which Italian artist sculpted 'The Ecstasy of Saint Teresa'?
Which modernist sculptor is known for his abstract, biomorphic shapes and was inspired by surrealism?
Which American artist is known for his mobiles, a type of moving sculpture?
The 'Moai' statues are located on which remote island?
Which contemporary British artist is known for her large-scale spider sculptures?
